sourceOfFunds.purpose: The source of fund of this year was contribution and donation for all project and social works. We used that money for the welfare of human being. Especially we used that fund for unemployed persons, which could not capable to pay fees of advance technical courses and diploma courses. We focused especially on urban and rural poor. With the help of this technical courses and diploma courses we tried to enhance the power of self confidence and earn the livelihood.

Year 2014-15 is third year of our organization’s establishment. This year we arrange fund from the contribution of social activists of our organization, like as every year. This year is very important for us because, this year we have done some different works from the viewpoint of society. The fund of this year (2014-15) was arranged by chief functionary, executive members, board members and other members, from help of charity, donation and contribution. That fund we used as welfare of human.

As per year this year the source of fund was contribution, charity and donation. The contribution was arranged by organization all social activist and donors. They contribute their physical, mental and financial support for achieving the target of vision and mission of organization. Here, described the whole work of year 2015-16 in the below, step by step and explain the target and achievement of success of this year. Firstly, we will discuss about the great achievement of this year.

The year 2017-18 was sixth year of our organization. This year was very important for us because, in this year our organization has completed their five year successfully. This year our organization provided many training to girls and women under training centers which are running under our organization. This year we provided ‘sewing diploma and beautician course’ under ‘next generation women development training center’ to all trainees, and the other hand we provided computer course.

isuues.name: Key Issues
isuues.value: Agriculture,Children,Education & Literacy,Environment & Forests,Health & Family Welfare,HIV/AIDS,Labour & Employment,Micro Finance (SHGs),Micro Small & Medium Enterprises,Nutrition,Rural Development & Poverty Alleviation,Women's Development & Empowerment

detailsOfAchievement: Pahal Grameen Sewas Samiti (PGSS) is a nonprofit organization registered under the Societies Registration Act 1860 in 2011 by a team of dedicated social activists from village-Saidpur, PO-Pipria Aagru, Pilibhit District. Pahal Grameen Sewa Samiti is working in the field of social and welfare field. The agency is registered under societies action 1860 and having its office at village-Saidpur, PO-Pipria Aagru, Pilibhit operating in the district. The agency has started community welfare activities in all 07 blocks viz. Marauri, Puranpur, Barkhera, Lalaurkhera, Bisalpur and Bilsanda blocks, Pilibhit. The activities of the organization were community welfare, philanthropic activities, and awareness camps like Self Help Groups-Bank Linkage Programme (SHG-BLP), Farmers Clubs (FCs), Financial Inclusion, Grameen Soochan Kendra (GSK), Nukkad Natak on various issues/aspects, HIV/AIDS, Tuberculosis, and Drugs, Environment, agriculture, Youth Awareness a part from the awareness camps this organization also observed various days like World HIV/AIDS Day, International Women Day, World TB Day. This organization is also actively involved in awareness about promotion, scientific and modern agriculture practices, financial services, employment generation, cultural and spiritual values. The activities conducted by this organisation are finance by its own resources and other agencies like NABARD. PGSS is active in all blocks with the collaboration of SHGs, FCs, youth clubs, mahila mandals, PIRs, students and Govt. Departments, etc. All the members of the agency are very active, young, energetic and having good knowledge experience of the field. All the committee members are residing in the same village, the distance of the village from district HQ is about 3km. All the members of the committee performed Nukkad Natak on various programmes like Financial Inclusion Programme, transfer of technology etc. wherever they organize their programmes. The agency also implementing Akshay Project-Awareness Programme on Tuber Closis (TB) in rural areas associated with Kaithalik Health Association of India, New Delhi.

detailsOfAchievement: PAHAL Social Organization is a national level non-profitable organization. PAHALâ€™s work is concentrated in the fields of Street Children, Education, Health and Community Development. On which we work, is the areas of great need and deserve to be the foci of our attention. We believe that the above mentioned fields are inter-related and it is the only way to make a sustainable and impactful difference in the beneficiary population. We work for the upliftment of the poor and destitute by helping them achieve socio-economic independence, self-sustainability and health. We do everything to provide educational and health services to the needy, mainstreaming marginalized street children, providing employment to low-literate youth and empowering women. We help those in need with full respect,affection,love and commitment, with the aim not to deliver charity but to empower them to better their own lot. Past Major Project: 1. Distribution of Stationary kit @ Allahabad 100 Pc 2. Sharamdaan 3. Distribution ofwollen clothes @ allahabad 800 pairs. 4.
